quote_first: A strange thought crossed his mind. He must remember to tell Clare that the top of Everest was about the same size as their dining-room table. George checked his watch:
quote_raw: A strange thought crossed his mind. He must remember to tell Clare that the top of Everest was about the same size as their dining-room table. George checked his watch: 3:36 P.M.
title: Paths of Glory
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: Meanwhile a girl was standing in an airport concourse. A big clock suspended from the ceiling said it was
quote_raw: Meanwhile a girl was standing in an airport concourse. A big clock suspended from the ceiling said it was twenty-four minutes to four.
title: The Intruders
author: Michael Marshall
